post.description: List cases using filters, pagination and custom ordering.

schema.title: List cases request
schema.description: Request to list cases with filtering and pagination

get.summary: Get external references for a case
get.description: Retrieve all external references that link a case to external systems such as ServiceNow. Returns the complete list of external references associated with the specified case.

schema.description: The unique identifier of the case in UUID format

get.description: Retrieve detailed information about a single case by its unique identifier.

schema.description: Unique ID of the case

patch.description: Apply a partial update (patch) to a case.

schema.description: ID of the case to update

schema.title: Case patch
schema.description: Partial set of fields to update on the case

post.description: Mark the case as acknowledged by a user.

schema.description: ID of the case to acknowledge

post.summary: Assign a case to a user
post.description: Assign a case to a specific user.

schema.description: ID of the case to assign

post.description: Remove a previously set priority override for a case.

schema.description: ID of the case

post.description: Close a case that no longer requires action.

schema.description: ID of the case to close
ID of the case to resolve
Reason to resolve

post.description: Override a case's computed priority with a specific value.

schema.description: ID of the case

post.description: Remove the current assignee from a case.

schema.description: ID of the case to unassign

post.description: Mark multiple cases as acknowledged in a single operation.

schema.title: Bulk acknowledge request
schema.description: Request to acknowledge multiple cases

items.description: IDs of the cases to acknowledge

post.summary: Assign multiple cases to a user
post.description: Assign multiple cases to a specific user in a single operation.

schema.title: Bulk assign request
schema.description: Request to assign multiple cases to a user

items.description: IDs of the cases to assign

post.summary: Remove priority override from multiple cases
post.description: Remove previously set priority overrides from multiple cases in a single operation.

schema.title: Bulk clear priority override request
schema.description: Request to clear priority override for multiple cases

items.description: IDs of the cases to clear priority override for

post.description: Close multiple cases in a single operation.

schema.title: Bulk close request
schema.description: Request to close multiple cases

items.description: IDs of the cases to close

post.description: Resolve multiple cases in a single operation.

schema.title: Bulk resolve request
schema.description: Request to resolve multiple cases

items.description: IDs of the cases to resolve

reason.example: These cases are no longer active.

post.description: Override the priority with for multiple cases in a single operation.

schema.title: Bulk override priority request
schema.description: Request to override priority for multiple cases

items.description: IDs of the cases to override priority for

post.description: Remove the current assignee from multiple cases in a single operation.

schema.title: Bulk unassign request
schema.description: Request to unassign multiple cases

items.description: IDs of the cases to unassign

post.description: Retrieve available filter and aggregation values for cases.

get.description: Retrieve all available grouping keys that can be used for organizing and filtering Cases.

AlertFilters.title: Alert filters
AlertFilters.description: Filters applied to cases based on alert properties.

items.description: List of alert IDs to filter on. Cases containing any of these alert IDs will be returned (OR logic).
List of alert version IDs to filter on. Cases containing indicators with any of these alert version IDs will be returned (OR logic).

AlertIndicator.title: Alert indicator
AlertIndicator.description: Data describing a triggered alert instance and its lifecycle relative to a case.

alertId.description: The unique alert ID (stable across versions).

items.description: Array of all alert version IDs for this indicator in the case. Includes the latest_alert_version.

latestAlertVersion.description: Last seen version ID of the triggered alert definition.

resolveTime.description: When present, timestamp when the alert resolved.

Case.title: Case
Case.description: Represents a case within the Cases service.

description.example: Investigating DB connection errors in prod

duration.description: Measures how long the Case is/was opened in milliseconds

readableId.description: Readable identifier of the case, available only for the cases that became Active

updateTime.description: When the case was last updated

CaseExternalReference.title: Case external reference
CaseExternalReference.description: External reference linking a case to an external system

id.description: The unique identifier of the case in the external system

url.description: The direct URL to view the case in the external system

CaseFilters.title: Case filters
CaseFilters.description: Filters applied when querying cases, including statuses, priorities, categories, groupings, and labels.

textSearch.description: Test search query applied to case titles

CaseLabelsFilter.title: Case Labels Filter
CaseLabelsFilter.description: Filters applied against Case's labels when queries/filters counted

CaseOrderBy.title: Case ordering specification
CaseOrderBy.description: Defines how cases should be sorted in the response. By default, cases are sorted by creation time and id in descending order. With this field, one can specify the primary sorting field and direction.

CaseResolverCxUser.title: Case resolver
CaseResolverCxUser.description: Entity responsible for resolving the case.

CaseResolverServiceNow.title: Case resolver
CaseResolverServiceNow.description: Entity responsible for resolving the case.

CaseResolverSystem.title: Case resolver
CaseResolverSystem.description: Entity responsible for resolving the case.

count.description: Number of cases in this category

DateRangeFilter.title: Date Range Filter
DateRangeFilter.description: A filter defining a date range with 'from' and 'to' timestamps.

from.description: Timestamp marking the start of the date range

to.description: Timestamp marking the end of the date range

FilterGroup.title: Filter group
FilterGroup.description: A filter group containing a key and its possible values.

key.description: Key of the filter group (e.g., service, environment)

items.description: Values associated with the filter group key

FilterPathAndValuesFilters.title: FilterPathAndValues
FilterPathAndValuesFilters.description: This data structure represents a filter path and values

FilterPathAndValuesMultipleValues.title: FilterPathAndValues
FilterPathAndValuesMultipleValues.description: This data structure represents a filter path and values

Filters.title: Filters
Filters.description: This data structure represents a filter

GetCaseExternalReferencesResponse.title: Get case external references response
GetCaseExternalReferencesResponse.description: Response containing the list of external references for a case

items.description: List of available grouping keys for organizing and filtering cases

ListCasesResponse.title: List cases response
ListCasesResponse.description: Response containing a list of cases and pagination information

MinMaxAuto.title: Min-Max
MinMaxAuto.description: Definition of min/max value configuration, can be automatically derived from data or custom

MinMaxCustom.title: Min-Max
MinMaxCustom.description: Definition of min/max value configuration, can be automatically derived from data or custom

count.description: Number of cases with this priority

PriorityDetails.title: Priority details
PriorityDetails.description: Priority details, including system computed and user override values.

ResolutionDetails.title: Resolution details
ResolutionDetails.description: Information about how and when a case was resolved.

resolveTime.description: Timestamp when the case was resolved

count.description: Count of cases for this value

cases.v1.GetFilterValuesResponse.title: Get case filter values response
cases.v1.GetFilterValuesResponse.description: Aggregated counts for building filters in the UI

pageSize.description: Number of items to return per page

pageToken.description: Token for the next page of results

skip.description: Number of items to skip before starting to collect results

nextPageToken.description: Token for the next page of results

cases.v1.UserDetails.title: User details
cases.v1.UserDetails.description: Minimal user identity information used in case assignments.

v1.KeyValue.title: Key-value pair
v1.KeyValue.description: Represents a simple key-value pair, often used for labels or groupings in cases.

key.description: Key of the pair (e.g., label or grouping name)
